about_the_game:
Enjoy the story of Frank, a young Argentinean who tired of the frustrations of his life decides to travel to Europe to try to have a better life, but during the trip, his ship is shipwrecked and wakes up on an island full of dangers, where strange humanoid Capybaras inhabit and have firmly dominated the island. Frank must survive in this strange land and find a way to escape to reach his destination.

Help Frank in this great adventure!

RPG Quests
Explore the scenery to complete them in order to advance the story, you will also have side quests.


Dialog system
You can have conversations with the characters and choose different answers, forge yourself Frank's character and personality.
Will you be kind and gentle, or will you be the worst of human beings?


Confront the fearsome Capibara cult
Fight with various melee weapons and defeat the fearsome enemies that will try to defeat you.
You will be able to perform normal, heavy, block and roll attacks. You can also lock on to your target


Loot chests and obtain crafting materials
There are several chests in the scenario containing materials so that you can create your own food and then sell the unneeded materials.


Have sex with people who want to have sex
Some dialogues have the option to conquer a character, if you decide to go that way, you can have sex with that character or not, note that this is completely optional, you can complete the game without accessing the erotic content.
There will be a warning in the dialogues with sexual results, so you can decide if you want to or not.


You will be able to farm trees and stones!
Collect wood from some trees and collect various special stones.
You will be able to use these materials to create new weapons from the crafting section.


Find all the collectibles!
You can find them hidden all over the stage, find them all!


Complete the Dark Temples
The dark temples will take you to a strange dimension where you will have to complete the temple challenges in order to successfully complete them.
By completing a temple, you will get an upgrade for your health, so you will be able to increase your health.



Explore ancient ruins
Explore many ancient ruins and discover all the secrets of this island, there will also be documents where you can read additional information that will enrich the story.


Explore the aquatic world
You will be able to swim so exploration will go a step further, discover the underwater world.


Go naked through life
You can customize Frank's clothes, you can choose between different shirts or pants, or simply wear nothing and be without clothes.


Come and venture out!


Help Frank escape from the island! Many adventures, characters and stories await you.

content_descriptors.notes:
Players can have sexual relations with some characters they meet on their adventure, completely optional and at the player's own choice.

All the characters represented in the game and with whom you can have sexual relations are of legal age.

name: Capibara Lost Dream
short_description: Enjoy the story of Frank and his adventure to escape from an island dominated by a cult of humanoid Capybaras, fight, explore, have sex and meet lots of fun characters!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Greek, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Arabic
*languages with full audio support
